title: Good enough
comment: This app lacks one thing: an ability to set up notifications for delays. Every so often the system has a problem and it would be nice to be told about them rather than open the app to find out. Other than that it's great.

title: Best BART app, ever.
comment: Thank you sooo much for never letting me miss the opportunity of using the restroom because I am afraid of missing the train. Now I know I can pee in peace. ✌
There used to be a better app with a trip planner

title: YOU ROCK
comment: Please don't ever stop working on this app. It is wonderful and has saved me so much time on my commute that I get to spend with my family :)

title: Really helpful
comment: Awesome to know how time to the next train. When you know your way around the Bay Area this app is a godsend.

title: Never go running for the train again
comment: Love this app. Real-time updates, easy to use, and I can save my routes to pull them up more quickly

title: Intuitive and accurate
comment: This is a great bart tracker. I love the departure time countdown, and its accuracy.
Nice!

title: Best Bart app
comment: I saw a TV screen at one of the Bart stations snowing where each train is realtime like a very slow video game. The timing information is there so that this feature could be added. An alarm when you get close to your destination would also be cool because I've slept past my destination more than once.
Love this app use it all the time and have found it to be very accurate. Hope the developer continues to keep it updated!

title: Bootsy
comment: The estimated arrival time is way off. Over 10 minutes from the east bay to the city. There were no delays. That's just unacceptable.

title: Reliable
comment: Very reliable app!

title: Great app, needs one thing
comment: I love this app, one feature that would be great is the ability to swap the departure/destination fields with the tap of a button like you can in Google maps. Using the quick lookup I'm often going back between the same two stations in reverse order.

title: great app!
comment: very easy to use, convenient, and accurate! Would the devs consider adding in a feature alerting users of potential high traffic days such as pride, giants games, etc?
Great App

title: Good
comment: Useful

title: Excellent
comment: Best app for on time train service

title: My favorite BART app
comment: I've used several, and this app is my new favorite. Set up your regular routes, then they are always there with one click.

title: Very tidy
comment: Live this app great for me traveling to San Fran
It work good

title: Good, but lacking a bit.
comment: Been using it for a while. Good for real-time, but noticing some flaws. For example, it doesn't show which station to transfer at or which line to transfer onto. Probably not a big deal for locals, but would be helpful still.

title: Foss ftw
comment: Keep it up!

title: Blah
comment: Not accurate enough!! Got to the station thinking I had time then missed it! Had to catch the next train 12 minutes later. I was late!!!! This has happrned a couple times. Uninstall.

title: Quick and convenient app!
comment: Great ui. Thanks for an excellent app!!!
easy to use and open source a great positive

title: Best Bart app for frequent commuter
comment: It has exactly what you need without adding complexity. You see all the station times that you are interested in at one glance. This developer understand daily commuters . thanks
Great app for timing

title: Great App!
comment: It helped me out.

title: Fast, simple, easy
comment: If you are a commuter on BART, this is all you need.
Loved it
It helps a lot

title: Great App!
comment: Tells you how many minutes and what time the BART gets to you! Tells you how much it's going to cost to get to your destination. It even tells you what time you'll to your destination. Wonderful app all in all. Never crashes! I've had this app on many devices and I've never had a problem.
Does what i need
Perfect, no nonsense

title: Eh... There are better ones out there
comment: Ive seen better on ios. Functions are limited. Works well for planning trips on one train but not for trips that include transfers.

title: Love It
comment: I haven't missed a Bart ever since I downloaded this app. Great job!

title: Best Quick Fix! But.   .
comment: Best to to quickly find and manage times for trains.  BUT, if you leave it on a live update page, which is accurate to about 3 seconds +/-, it will drain your battery but not the apps fault.  Also, this is a small app for tracking and predicting trains.  It does that perfectly.  If you need more than you may need a different app.

title: Slow to update
comment: Oakland airport station has been open since last year.
Works when there are delays also!

title: Needs an option to lock routes list on the home screen
comment: From time to time I accidentally delete some routes from the home screen - they may be deleted by a very slight swipe when you're going to tap on a route. So, you need to add the same route again. Would be nice to have an option to lock the list of routes.
Works great reliably & accurately

title: Nice app but missing AirBart
comment: Works nice but it misses the connection to OAK / AirBart. It would be nice if you could set layover times yourself, with big luggage or slow walking vs profi runner
Cool tool

title: Elegant in its simplicity
comment: Simple so give you live updates on departures for you most frequently traveled routes. It has a couple neat add ins like a system map, system announcements and elevator updates. One thing that would be neat to see in the future is station departure times tied into your location.

title: Best BART app
comment: Awesome app.  Easy interface allows you to store common routes.  Also, REAL TIME arrivals, not just schedules, and real time service alerts, as well as yes, the seconds count down!!!

title: Great app
comment: Love the real-time information and details in one view

title: Perfect!
comment: A very helpful app for sure! Always know when the next train is coming and when i get to a station with time to spare i can see what time my train will be arriving at stations before mine so i ride up to those stations to make sure i can get a seat! I'm hooked!
No ads, accurate and easy to use

title: Useful
comment: Very useful, but UI is dated, needs widgets and Android Wear support.
Best Bart app for real-time information

title: Exactly what is neefed
comment: This application is exactly what is needed when you're trying to catch a BART train. Gives you the estimated arrival so you determine whether it's time to head to the station. I will use this application on all of my trips to the Bay Area. Its got a clean interface and seems stable.

title: Awesome!
comment: Just what I wanted. A widget would be amazing. I can help if the code is opensource BTW. A notification for the most common trains I take would be amazing as well!

title: Times are pretty accurate
comment: If there wre no delays the times are pretty accurate

title: Flawless
comment: This is obviously designed by a BART rider. Every feature I wanted/need is provided. Easily see arrival times on your favorite train routes. Quick alarm settings made out a 5 start for me.

title: Perfect with a data plan, almost perfect without
comment: This app was great for me as a non-US traveller without a data plan. Small in size and easy to use, it got me where I needed to be and let me tell my friends when to expect me at the station because I was able to use the SFO wifi. An offline way to see the next train would have made this perfect for me.
Does exactly what I need

title: Very handy
comment: Great app, love it.

title: Ok for diect but does not do connections well
comment: Excellent app if your train goes directly where you want. I think it maxs at one connection. Eg sfo airport to fremont, it does not see an opporunity to change at balboa and bay fair and save 20 -30minutes. The bart mobile web app gives it. Hence mixed

title: No overall schedule
comment: Only next trains approaching.

title: I use this every day. Very handy!

comment: It works and it's simple to use
The UI is pretty ugly but I love this app

title: No schedule
comment: Always show no schedule. Uninstall!
GOOD JOB
Reliable, light weight. I appreciate the fair calculator.
Typically accurate but have missed my train twice in last week due to inaccuracies.

title: nice and simple
comment: Good for what it says it does.  I would like to see all trains from a station in a direction, so for example all northbound trains from MacArthur, without specifying an endpoint.

title: Great App
comment: Helpful guide for a relative newbie in terms of using BART. The info was accurate and the scheduling was on-time.

title: Bart runner
comment: A like this app so that a dont get boring and all secule without wating an go to bart station

title: It'll do
comment: This is the best app for BART I found, but it could definitely be better. I wish it linked to the schedule (so I could check lest train times) and listed arrival information for a given stop without having to input the destination.

title: Love this app!
comment: Very good with timing if trains arriving and departing between stations and getting route information.
Great

title: Some nice features, but lacking overall
comment: The app's nicest feature is the countdown to the next departing train from a given station. However, there's no trip planner! I can't see further than three trains into the future from any given station. That's a crucial feature that this app doesn't have.

title: Bar runner
comment: Very handy

title: Thanks
comment: Awesome. Very accurate

title: No better than the BART mobile website
comment: Told me to get on the wrong train. I'm a new BART traveler and I thought this app would help me. Wrong. I ended up at the end of the bay point line when I needed to be in Richmond.

title: Transfer stations not shown
comment: Love the countdown and fare shown,  but hard to plan a trip if you don't know where to transfer. Have to switch back and forth between schedule page and map.

title: Best app in my phone
comment: It does everything you want a Bart app to do. No more looking at paper schedules or waiting for the Bart because you didn't know what time it arrives. Amazing!!!

title: Great app..
comment: Love it, one suggestion if tiles can be locked sometimes scrolling up and down I delete the tiles.

title: Awesome app! Widget?
comment: Friend told me about this app and I haven't touched another Bart app since. Super easy to use and the ability to click a specific train to add it to your notification bar is fantastic. Would love a widget to show next departure time for the station I'm nearest.

title: Great except for offline use
comment: App allows for storing routes which is great for at a glance arrival times. My only issue is that there is no offline caching which is poor for bad connections

title: I like the app
comment: Easy to use, but sometimes takes awhile for info to show and have to restart it to do so.

title: super accurate
comment: really accurate timing for Bart. because I'm always running late I'd appreciate an option to subtract two minutes from the ETA

title: Simple, Real-Time BART Info (and no ads!) -
comment: This app is excellent for quick access to real-time BART departures. Once you set your favorite routes, the next departure and price is shown for each route upon opening the app. Tap the route to reveal 2 more future departures. Tap one of the departures for more options. It will show if a transfer is needed, but no transfer station is indicated. Setting an alarm puts an entry in the notification shade, but no alarm actually sounds. Future schedules aren't available (suggest BART Usher if you need this).

title: Super Fast
comment: Quick & Easy

title: Sunday inaccurate
comment: The schedule for Sundays is inaccurate. It doesn't tell you that you need to transfer in Bay Fair and I know you do.   I prefer BART Usher.

title: Best BART application
comment: This is the best BART train schedule application, by far. Updated to the last second. Very impressive. Thanks for creating this helpful application. It keeps me on schedule and on time every day.

title: Beautiful app
comment: Saved my skin many times. Thank you!

title: Timing is a spot on match
comment: Excellent app has got accurate timing details

title: Great app

comment: In the time it takes this app to retrieve the schedule, I can walk to the nearest Bart station, check the schedule, and walk home.

comment: Great great app for Bart runner like me, who always gets on train the vety last minutes ;p.

comment: I know what it takes to make a quality app since I do android dev myself. Heres 5 stars from a fan

Now I am the guy who can see people running and tell them that the departure is still 5 minutes away, or that the train just left anyway.  A tip to the dev: perhaps you would be interestd to make a pro version that provides an alarm for when the rider approaches the desired stop? You could use GPS and timing data to calculate what train the rider is at, maybe use the accelerometers to detect when the train stops underground.

title: Very good.
comment: Very good app, really dead on accuracy. Definitely would recommend this for any who takes bart

comment: Easy to use interface,  well displayed selection of information. Used BART website before,  but this is far better.  And it's open source!

comment: I used Bart Runner when in town for work. Being unfamiliar with the trains, lines, and schedules could have been an issue. Not with Bart Runner! It works perfectly.

title: Fantsstic app

title: Perfect!

title: Very slick app!

title: Accurate real time schedule to seconds
comment: Clean and fast to use interface compared to other similar apps. Just installed it and it saved me right on the first use. I ran like heck to catch the bart at the last second thanks to the real time schedule :)

title: Better than the other BART app I used to use!
comment: Can't wait to utilize it some more! The features on it e far auperior to what I am used to using. Interface is simpler and looks sleeker too!

title: Does not do what's needed

title: Best app to date for bart
comment: No complaints here. Nice work..

title: Awesome app
comment: Awesome app! works great on an s4. Love it.

title: use it everyday!
comment: great app. use it everyday on the way to and from work. does exactly what you want a Bart app to do. clean interface. many thanks to the dev!

title: Lacks full timetable
comment: You can only see departure times in the immediate future. Omitting full timetables is a complete fail. Useless unless you are already close to the departing station.

title: Love it!
comment: Saved my butt countless times.  Definitely recommend it.

title: Love it!
comment: Can run  from the office and know just when to catch the next train!

title: Best BART app
comment: This is my first play store review, to let everyone know I've fallen in love with this app. It's always their most reliable BART tracker I've tried.  Thanks!!

title: Very sweet app!!
comment: I am not a daily BART rider so don't know the schedule so was looking for an app that is simple and to the point.  This one fits the bill perfectly!! If there is a donation link or button I'd send few bucks to the developer for a free beer.  Good job!
Why is the app not addressing Bart striking?

title: Great app
comment: Perfect. Does everything I want it to.
Very nice.  Appreciate the countdown to departure.

title: A widget would rule
comment: This app is the bees knees, but I would totally pay a buck or two if he created a widget.

title: Dang, this is useful.
comment: It really is useful.
Doesnt accurately report delays, which is really the point isn't it.

Unfortunately, I can only make the app as good as the data BART publishes, which is often on a delay. The app does check for alerts every 90 seconds or so, but that's no good if BART isn't promptly publishing those alerts. Sorry for the frustration!

title: Darned good app
comment: This is the app that I'd recommend to BART commuters... Real time info, upcoming trains, delay notification... Indispensable really.

title: Simple and brilliant
comment: The user interface is pure and the times are pinpoint accurate. I use this app every day.
Quick access to the minimum functionality I need

title: New version has issue when reordering routes
comment: I've used this app for a year, and it worked great, until new update that allows user to drag and drop to reorganize. Feature is not implemented correctly here is why: if you drag only vertically, then it reorders fine. However, if you touch route horizontally or drag route vertically + a bit horizontal to reorder, then route disappears and gets erased. Then user has to recreate route again. I've multiple routes saved, but due to that horizontal issue with drag feature, I had to go back to an older version.

Reordering should only happen if you grab the drag handle on the left side (in fact, the row should only move vertically, not horizontally). If you swipe left or right elsewhere on the row, the row should move horizontally (not vertically), and the row will be deleted if you flick it away. Are you seeing different behavior? bartrunner@dougkeen.com

title: I would give a 10/10
comment: Simple and to the point!

title: Best BART app.
comment: This app is easier to try than explain.  But it is incredibly accurate, to the precise second most often.  Nice programming by developer. Lightweight, no ads. Updated frequently with useful features.

title: Can't say enough good things...
comment: Extremely useful app, quick, easy to use, accurate. And I swear, I reported a quick departure lookup crash I was having to the developer, and alas, a new version that fixed the issue was released a mere six hours later... I felt like the update was just for me! ;)   Good stuff!

title: Great app
comment: This app saved me more times than i can count. And the system map is nice if you can't see the actual map. Keep up the good work

title: Easy and accurate
comment: Being new to the BART system I knew I needed a reliable way of checking the schedule to see if I should hurry or not. There are many out there but this one hit it out if the park on the first try. Even includes the station map so noobs like me don't miss our train or take the wrong one.

title: Excellent
comment: Best BART app

title: Excellent app
comment: Works flawlessly. Tells me without fail the only thing that matters: am I gonna make the next train?  The other functionality works quite well too! Solid app and no ads to boot.

title: Great job!
comment: Thanks for the simplicity and the precise arrive times!

title: Best BART app available
comment: Great app, has all the features you need for commuting on BART.
:) Thanks for your suggestions

title: Best BART App ever
comment: I've used several different apps to track public transportation systems in different countries and this is one is by far the best I've seen. It's simple, intuitive and fast going straight to the information that you really need. great job.

title: Pretty perfect
comment: Does everything it should and does it all really well.  The UX could be a little more designed / interesting but the utility is totally there.

title: Could do more
comment: Solid app, works well, but needs more functionality
What other functions would you suggest? Please email them to bartrunner@dougkeen.com and I'll see what I can implement!

title: For Immediate Use Only
comment: This app is not for someone who is planning out the day or a future day. This app only provides departure times for immediate use, within an hour or so at time of look up.
That's correct. This app is specifically targeted to commuters or people who are otherwise familiar with BART, not infrequent users who need trip planners.

title: Very good
comment: My favorite BART app

title: Exactly what I wanted
comment: Let's me save my most common rides, and I love the scrolling info with arrival time, # of cars, etc.

title: Simple, fast, awesome
comment: I've tried a lot of BART apps and so far I'm digging this one a lot.   Super fast and accurate real time results, more details if you need them (like number of cars) and a cool developer who listens to users thoughts.  ** Update ** I just realized that if you select a train in the app this program will add the arrival time to your notification center which is really convenient!

title: BART Runner Review
comment: For some reason, it does not work well with my Samsung Galaxy, keeps crashing on changing routes. The user interface is simple but I can not read the BART map. The app is not committed to good user interface.

There's something screwy with the original Samsung Galaxy phone, and this bug only affects that one model (and it's a nasty, nearly impossible to track down bug). I've since removed that phone model from the supported phones list. Sorry!

title: Awesome
comment: Simple clean and useful.

title: Aptly named! Easy to use
comment: I like how this one is setup to show how much time you have left before the train arrives, so you know when to start running

title: Great product
comment: Does exactly what it says. Would be nice to have the ability to just view all trains at the station with estimates, but it works great as is. Easily worth a few dollars but is free and ad free. Highly recommended.  If I'm staying in wish list mode, maybe a recurring reminder for "the latest train that should arrive before X time" - so you say you want to go from A to B by 8:10, and starting around 7, it wakes up and checks and alerts you the amount of time you specified to get to the station.

title: Rocks!
comment: On bart for first time in a while.  This thing had the train to the second it stopped :)

title: Shows how many cars
comment: Only app to do this... Makes a difference when you want a seat.

title: Great app!
comment: I love this app. It's powerful, yet so simple and intuitive.

title: Flawless
comment: Functional app. Anything I would ask for is some more colour. But the design fits the Android 4 style, and the app is functional and reliable. Can't ask for more :)

title: Best Bart app
comment: Doesn't do much. But what it does do it does extremely well.   No ads. Clean UI. Open source. What's not to like?

Simply best one on market
Thank you

title: Easy!!
comment: Update 10 / 2012...this is truly worth every penny - it's a fab app...and I never thought I'd really use it to 'run' to Bart...but guess what? I do - several times a week!!! Whew, I need to get into better shape! Haven't used in real time but seems incredibly easy and straight forward. Took only seconds to set up my favorite routes. Update- is best Bart app I've ever used and only one that seems to be truly in sync with schedules.

title: Most useful app ever
comment: Walking to bart,  saw i only had 2 minutes,  sprinted the rest of the way and avoided a 20 minute wait for the next train. Bart runner is the best.

comment: Does exactly what it says it does. Make sure to navigate away when you're done or your battery will drain

That said, Open BART is actually a very pretty app

title: Great Bart app to replace or compliment others

title: Awesome app
comment: Real time departures are sweet!  Very helpful when u r in a hurry

title: BART Runner
comment: Very useful app! Better than BART itself.

title: Not accurate!
comment: Off by 5 minutes
Can you send more details of the bugs you're seeing to bartrunner@dougkeen.com?

title: Love it
comment: New to the area and really helps me find out where and how to take bart... I absolutely love it!!
It has all the details I am looking for and simple to use.  Thank you.

title: Great bart time table
comment: This app does all I want for getting me to a bart train on time. Developer is friendly and responsive to any issues.

title: Works great!
comment: Really handy. Saves a lot of time having this on my phone. I really like that it shows which trains allow bikes, and that it saves favorite routes.

title: The only BART app for daily commuters
comment: I love this app. Simple, elegant, and functional. It works well and is shockingly accurate.

title: Love it
comment: Best of the bunch

title: Great app!
comment: This app saves me from being late to class almost everyday! Beautifully simple and effective.

title: Missing/wrong timings
comment: A lot of times departure timings are missing or are wrong. For example, it wont tell me there is a Richmond train from Fremont departing in the next 7 minutes but instead only shows 22 minutes and later.  I still give 3 stars for interface but the unreliability is very bad.
Can you send more details of the problems you're seeing to bartrunner@dougkeen.com? I'd like to knock out any bugs you may be seeing (they may be specific to the route you normally take).

title: great app!
comment: The countdown timer is great!

title: As advertised
comment: Not the most full-featured BART app out there, but does exactly what it says it will do, and shows bicycle information.  Fast and easy to use.

title: Run baby run, very useful countdowns
comment: A offline system map would be a nice addition!
Perfect for me. Thanks.
Streamlined for quick access to the times I need on a daily basis. Good work Doug. Thanks for the awesome/simple app. Consider a first start tutorial.
This has already saved my butt....i'm perpetually late and as a violinist can't afford to be! Also saves me from having to double check routes.
